short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: convert url into santango(three words). you can open url with santango.xyz.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Santango is a new URL shortening service with easily remember 3 words.
No need QR code anymore, Just put 3 words.

Example:
blue bird fly(Google Earth), young beautiful lady(Youtube)

You can convert url into three words with this extension.
